name: Seamonkey Tabs on Top
description:
Tabs on top for Seamonkey.

This style is not compatible with "seamonkey modern". Please use "seamonkey default theme" or "Classic Firefox theme for SeaMonkey"

If you have any issues, please contact me at twitter(@sys9kdr).


NOTE : There is a bug in this style about PDF.
additional_info:
13/03/01 created
13/06/22 Fix
14/02/20 Fix pdf issue, but it's not completely removed.
15/05/13 Add license

discussions.name: It is good but pdfs are hard to read
